channel.title: Running/compiling a 718 on linux..?
channel.description:
I recently downloaded a 718 and am trying to host it on my ubuntu linux server. I can't get it to compile or run without errors and Im not sure what to change. run [code] java -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false [/code] Errors [code] Usage: .... ./run: line 2: lib/demorpg.jar: Permission denied ./run: line 2: com.rs.Launcher: command not found [/code]
Compile [code] javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Player.java javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Equipment.java javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/Launcher.java javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java
[/code] Errors [code] javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options ./compile: line 2: -sourcepath: command not found compiled Player folder javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options ./compile: line 4: -sourcepath: command not found compiled Equipments javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options ./compile: line 6: -sourcepath: command not found compiled Server folder javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options ./compile: line 8: -sourcepath: command not found compiling Dialogues javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options ./compile: line 10: -sourcepath: command not found compiled Main Server Folder javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options ./compile: line 12: -sourcepath: command not found compiled Main Server Folder javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options ./compile: line 14: -sourcepath: command not found [/code]
Any help is much appriciated
Edit: Got it to compile fine by quoting the classpath, in hindsight that was pretty obvious... Still messing with the running though...

item.title: Running/compiling a 718 on linux..?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Hiaburi, post:4, topic:470189”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=587586.msg4169114#msg4169114 date=1354059607]
You definitely can’t use a bat for linux… You need the shell files…
[/quote]
They are in shell files

Also: The separator is a colon in linux, not the semi-colon like in windows.

Thanks, I tried replacing the first one and removing the second one before, errored, replaced both and it worked perfect[/quote]
Not everyone knows to convert to shell. Some like to write shell code into bats. Sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Running/compiling a 718 on linux..?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

sk8rdude461:

You definitely can’t use a bat for linux… You need the shell files…

They are in shell files

zyle1992:

Also: The separator is a colon in linux, not the semi-colon like in windows.

Thanks, I tried replacing the first one and removing the second one before, errored, replaced both and it worked perfect

Read full topic

item.title: Running/compiling a 718 on linux..?
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

I recently downloaded a 718 and am trying to host it on my ubuntu linux server. I can’t get it to compile or run without errors and Im not sure what to change.
run

java -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false

Errors

Usage:
....
./run: line 2: lib/demorpg.jar: Permission denied
./run: line 2: com.rs.Launcher: command not found

Compile

javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Player.java
javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/Equipment.java
javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/Launcher.java
javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java
javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java
javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java
javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java

Errors

javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
./compile: line 2: -sourcepath: command not found
compiled Player folder
javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
./compile: line 4: -sourcepath: command not found
compiled Equipments
javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
./compile: line 6: -sourcepath: command not found
compiled Server folder
javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
./compile: line 8: -sourcepath: command not found
compiling Dialogues
javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
./compile: line 10: -sourcepath: command not found
compiled Main Server Folder
javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
./compile: line 12: -sourcepath: command not found
compiled Main Server Folder
javac: invalid flag: lib/equipids.xml
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
./compile: line 14: -sourcepath: command not found

Any help is much appriciated

Edit: Got it to compile fine by quoting the classpath, in hindsight that was pretty obvious… Still messing with the running though…
